text: Troy Ball Club Grounds was a baseball ground in Watervliet, New York. It was home to the Troy Trojans baseball club of the National League for the 1882 season. == References == *Retrosheet. "Park Directory". Retrieved 2006-09-04. ==External links== *Seamheads.com Ballparks Database: Troy Ball Club Grounds Category:Sports venues in Rensselaer County, New York Category:Defunct baseball venues in the United States Category:Sports in New York's Capital District Category:Baseball venues in New York (state) Category:Watervliet, New York
title: Troy Ball Clubs Grounds
